properties.name: sitmun.client.unsafe-allowed-hosts
properties.description: List of hostnames that are allowed to use unsafe SSL connections. Use '*' to allow all hosts.

properties.name: sitmun.backend.config.url
properties.description: URL for the SITMUN backend configuration API endpoint. This is the URL where the proxy middleware will request configuration data.

properties.name: sitmun.backend.config.secret
properties.description: Secret key for authenticating with the SITMUN backend configuration API. This secret is used in the X-SITMUN-Proxy-Key header.
